keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting against Conservative and Liberal Democrat cuts to public services; committed to not allowing reduced budgets for NHS, schools and other public services.
A campaigner against a hard Brexit; leading figure in the national campaign to remain in the EU; co-sponsored legislation to protect rights of EU citizens to stay.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Locally, this election is a straight fight between me and the Conservative candidate.

issues.brexitEurope: Campaigned to remain in the EU, against a hard Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am asking for your vote to be re-elected as the Member of Parliament for our area at the General Election on Thursday 8th June 2017.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for our area
politicalExperience.achievements: Established an office in the heart of the constituency, helped over 10,000 local residents, have spoken in Parliament over 700 times on various issues, campaigned regarding the service of Southern Rail.

images.caption: Re-elect Chuka - a local boy, working hard for you

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Joel Bodmer on behalf of Chuka Umunna both at 1 Empire Mews, London, SW16 2BF; Printed by Greagate Printers, Pink Bank Lane, Manchester, M12 5GH.
